page.title: 13CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content:
they are dependent on those willing to give their help voluntarily and those who participate.
{KEEP FIT AND YOGA A local lady arranges regular meetings for anyone interested in keep_fit and yoga.Usually the group meet weekly.Although it is a serious group for the purpose of exercising and keeping fit it is also a lot of fun.Routines are put to music and we also developed one for our svhool pageant.
{THE BALLROOM SOCIETY Ballroom dancing is held weekly in the village hall.The first part of the evening is taken up by a lesson in a particular dance.Then a coffee break is taken followed by general dancing. At the end of each term the club hold
